thread.title: Eugenie Bouchard returns serve to critics of Sports Illustrated shoot - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Eugenie Bouchard returns serve to critics of Sports Illustrated shoot - Yahoo7

author: On February
title: Eugenie Bouchard returns serve to critics of Sports Illustrated shoot - Yahoo7
text:
Share Eugenie Bouchard returns serve to critics of Sports Illustrated shoot - Yahoo7 Canadian tennis star Eugenie Bouchard has hit back after receiving criticism for appearing in Sports Illustrated's Swimsuit issue. Close Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated UP NEXT VIDEO Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated. Source: Sports Illustrated Eugenie Bouchard in Sports Illustrated 
The 22-year-old is gracing the pages of the 2017 Swimsuit issue alongside fellow tennis stars Serena Williams and Caroline Wozniacki. 
Bouchard says she encountered a number of online trolls who told her to concentrate on tennis rather than appearing in the iconic magazine. Image: Eugenie Bouchard/Instagram 
But ahead of the Mexican Open, she had the perfect response to her haters. 
"I've gotten that over the last couple of years I've done a photo shoot anywhere it's like 'oh god, get back on the tennis court... what are you doing, go practice," Bouchard told CBS Sports. Image: Eugenie Bouchard/Instagram 
"I practised for six hours today and I did this like two hours after. I'm practising for six hours [a day] all this week, 'what are you talking about ... do you work 24 hours a day?' 
"You have to deal with that hate and not take it personally. It's been a couple of years now." Close Bouchard takes random fan on a date UP NEXT VIDEO Bouchard takes random fan on a date. Source: 7News Bouchard takes random fan on a date 
Bouchard said she'd be silly to pass up an opportunity like Sports Illustrated. 
"There's nothing wrong if you have success and it opens doors for other activities, like being in Sports Illustrated. Why not? I would be crazy not to take advantage of that. Close Eugenie agrees to second date UP NEXT VIDEO Eugenie agrees to second date. Source: TMZ Eugenie agrees to second date 
"Why limit yourself? I'm still a tennis player – that is my number one priority – but if I do have a bit of time, here and there, to do other things, why not?" 
It's been a massive couple of weeks for Bouchard, who also made international headlines when she followed through with a bet and took a random fan on a date. Close Bouchard reveals gift from date UP NEXT
